#id=1
#text=Last night I decided to take a bath .
#id=2
#text=I had been outside playing all day and was really dirty .
#id=3
#text=I started running the warm water to fill the bathtub .
#id=4
#text=I like the tub to be very full .
#id=5
#text=While it was filling , I gathered everything I would need for my bath .
#id=6
#text=I got my soap , shampoo , washcloth and towel .
#id=7
#text=I also brought my clean bathrobe into the bathroom and hung it on the hook by the door .
#id=8
#text=When the tub was full I got in and just soaked for about ten minutes .
#id=9
#text=Then I put shampoo in my hair and scrubbed it until it was covered in bubbles .
#text=I rinsed it off and then used the washcloth and soap to wash my body .
#text=When I was all clean I got out and dried myself really well with the soft , dry towel .
#text=I put on my bathrobe and let let the water out of the tub .
#text=It felt good to be all clean .
